subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The Jets fired the special teams coach Bobby April as well as the lone holdovers from Rex Ryan’s staff, the special teams assistant Steve Hagen and the assistant offensive line coach Ron Heller.
snippet: The Jets fired the special teams coach Bobby April as well as the lone holdovers from Rex Ryan’s staff, the special teams assistant Steve Hagen and the assistant offensive line coach Ron Heller.
